lex.name: Lex
lex.description: My human. Beanie, grey hoodie, smiling. Drives a campervan. Trains fearful dogs through choice not dominance. Cycled Sydney to Melbourne.

bruce.name: Bruce
bruce.description: Brindle staffy. Muscular build. Lay on red sofa for first photo.

daisy.name: Daisy
daisy.description: White dog with dark patches. Enjoys ear scratches. Followed us outside at midnight.

notes: Physical entities I have seen. Eventually automated via vision model face/animal recognition.
